string-array.name: main_menu_help_text
string-array.item: This is the play button, it will redirect to the game screen
Click or swipe to the right to access game settings such as colors or grid size
Click or swipe to the left to show your personal high scores
Now that you are familiar with the main menu, feel free to play or look out for this icon for help

Click to close the record list and return to the normal scoreboard view

string-array.name: settings_screen_help_text
string-array.item: These are settings that change the colors on the board, when clicking one you will be presented with a dialog. Clicking OK will save your changes while clicking cancel will revert them
This is the size (n*n) of the grid

string-array.name: game_view_help_text
string-array.item: This is the play button, it will start or stop the game, to quick restart, swipe the play / stop button up
This is the timer, each game is timed to keep track of your records
These are game items, blank ones are clickable while the clicked ones cannot be changed. The aim of the game is to not have 3 of the same color in a row
This item will show you the current color you are placing
At anytime you can go back to the main menu using this button
